headlines.description: Henrikh Mkhitaryan scored a debut goal to help Paulo Fonseca secure his first win as AS Roma coach in a 4-2 victory over Sassuolo.
headlines.shortLinkText: Mkhitaryan scores first Roma goal in Sassuolo rout

headlines.description: AC Milan's Krzysztof Piatek returned to the lineup and converted the winner with a penalty in a hard-fought 1-0 victory at 10-man Hellas Verona.
headlines.shortLinkText: Piatek penalty gives Milan win over 10-man Verona
